definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
seven heavenly bodies and four imaginary stars (in astrology and feng shui)
to deduce/to infer/an implication/same as 推演
arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)
divination combined with mystical Confucian philosopy, prevalent during the Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220)
Ptolemy or Claudius Ptolemaeus (c. 90-c. 168), Alexandrian Greek astronomer, mathematician and geographer, author of the Almagest 天文學大成|天文学大成/see also 托勒密[Tuo1 le4 mi4]
variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
list of emperors and kings/dynastic genealogy
